characters: GATHER THE MEN AND MEET AT BERK
WHAT ARE YOU GUYS DOING HERE
BECAUSE WAR IS WHAT HE WANTS, SON
HE CAN'T FLY ON HIS OWN
ATTACK THE DRAGONS RIDER'S NEST AT
AND THEN WE WILL TAKE BERK
WE WILL TAKE DOWN THEIR ALPHA...
YOU WILL NEVER HOLD ON TO THOSE

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup and Toothless BLUR PAST, leaving a wake that leads

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Sequence 0200 - New Berk) To the island village of Berk, festively adorned with fla and banners. Major new additions alter its familiar skyli

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: This... is Berk. The best kept secret this side of, well, anywhere. Granted, it may not look like much, but this wet heap of rock packs more than a few surprises. ON A CLUSTER OF SHEEP, hiding nervously between buildings shadows of passing dragons race by. The group moves as on receding into a shadowy alley, pushing one sheep out into light. It's suddenly snatched and carried into the air!

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Life here is amazing, just not for the faint of heart. See, where most folks enjoy hobbies like whittling or needlepoint, we Berkians prefer a little something we like to call-- WHOOSH, WHOOSH, WHOOSH! A wash of VIBRANT COLORS blurs by DRAGONS BARREL PAST at a dizzying speed. Their RIDERS SWI KICK, and ROLL into one another while they WEAVE neck in between the houses, docks, and revamped structures of Ber

dialogues.speaker: DRAGON RACING
dialogues.text: It's like an aerial version of the Monte Carlo race. Spectators ROAR from wooden bleachers, fastened to cliff faces and perched over the sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: FISHLEGS, now 20 and even larger, rides his gronkle, MEAT who carries the sheep in her claws, until...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: SNOTLOUT, also 20, but every bit as juvenile, and his Monstrous Nightmare, HOOKFANG, steal the sheep from them. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 2.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I'm sorry, Fishlegs! Did you want that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snotlout! That's mine! Snotlout FALLS BACK toward RUFFNUT and TUFFNUT, who lag o their two-headed Zippleback, BARF & BELCH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here ya go, babe. With a chivalrous grin, Snotlout tosses the sheep to Ruff She SNATCHES it with a sneer and a GRUMBLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did I tell you that you look amazing today? `Cause you do.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Barf. It's starting to stink around here. Barf starts to peel off, spewing gas. Tuffnut mocks Snotl with a mugging grin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope. Still hates you. Let's blow this place, Belch! Belch ignites the gas, sparking a flashy explosion, and leaving Snotlout behind in the smoke. As they rush past the main bleachers, Ruffnut DROPS her s into one of five baskets suspended over a chasm at the la crossing. Each backboard bears an image of its correspond dragon. The Barf/Belch basket filled to the brim with she Presiding over the game, STOICK turns to the frenzied cro

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's nine for the Twins, Astrid lags with three, Fishlegs and Snotlout trail with NONE! Stoick eyes an empty basket at the far end, its backboard painted with an image of Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Hiccup is... nowhere to be found. Hmmm. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 3.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Scared him off with the big talk, didn't ya, Stoick? WHACK! Snotlout, still smoldering from the blast, gets CLIPPED from behind. ASTRID, rolls in, astride STORMFLY - spirited and competitive as ever, and beautiful despite herself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing, Snotlout?! They're going to win now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She's my princess! Whatever she wants, she gets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut?! Didn't she try to bury you alive?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Only for a few hours! BACK TO THE RACERS, as they peel away, pouring on the spe

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Dragons used to be a bit of a problem here. But that was five years ago. Now they've all moved in. And, really, why wouldn't they? The racers chase each other through a sprawling hangar an into a vast cave, teeming with colorfully painted dragon stables. They exit through the far side and circle back through the village, blasting past many of its dragon- friendly additions.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We have custom stables... all-you- can-eat feeding stations... a full service dragon wash...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the village, a baby Gronkle sneezes, accidentally sett one of the Viking houses aflame.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Even top-of-the-line fire prevention, if I do say so myself. Astrid rolls her eyes, peels away from the other dragon racers, and yanks open a spout on the overhead network of aqueducts, dousing the flames with a surge of water. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 4.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK TO STOICK, amused as he watches the racers round the island, searching for sheep. He turns to Gobber and nods.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's time, Gobber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Righty-ho! (aloud, to the crowd) Last lap! A HORN sounds. The racers all turn to each other, excited

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The black sheep! Come on, Stormfly! We can still win this thing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Barf!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go, Meatlug! GOBBER loads the BLACK SHEEP onto a catapult.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is your big moment. Have a nice flight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls the trigger, LAUNCHING the black sheep into the Astrid spots it and steers Stormfly into a steep climb to it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up, up, up! In a flash, Fishlegs and Meatlug blur past, NABBING the sheep.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good job, Meatlug! Fishlegs tosses his captured prize to Ruffnut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Here you go, darling. Mine's worth ten! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 5.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! The Black Sheep! Snotlout sighs, frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You guys are fighting for Ruffnut?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm totally winning!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fishlegs hovers up nest to Ruffnut with a starry-eyed smi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're winning together! She RAMS BARF into Meatlug, sending Fishlegs into an uncontrolled SPIN. He SLAMS into Snotlout, sending their dragons TUMBLING head over tail. The crowd goes wild.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one can stop me now!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Except for me. We're attached, genius!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He GRABS at the sheep. Ruffnut fights back, inciting a tu war.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Quit trying to steal all my glory! And while they're distracted, Astrid steers Stormfly towa them, CLOSING IN.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get `em, Astrid!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's MY glory! No sheep, no You're always ruining glory! EVERYTHING! Astrid leaps off of Stormfly, runs up Belch's spindly nec and PLUCKS the black sheep from the Twins' hands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gotcha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She tumbles through the air onto Stormfly, sticking a per landing, black sheep in hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 6.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK TO STOICK, beside himself. The crowd ROARS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well played! Hahaha! (gloating, to the crowd) That's my future daughter-in-law!

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO ASTRID ON STORMFLY
dialogues.text: eyeing the fast-approaching FINISH LINE, unaware as... FISHLEGS suddenly RAMS Meatlug into Stormfly, sending Ast off-course. She recovers and sees Snotlout flying headlon toward her, war hammer cocked, aiming at Astrid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, excuse me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormfly! Snotlout HURLS his hammer. Astrid ducks and rolls Stormfl out of the way. The hammer catches Fishlegs in the face w a CLANG. The crowd collectively winces.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid and Stormfly recover from their roll, loop over th water, and they BLAST past the finish line, DUNKING the b sheep into their basket!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's thirteen! Astrid takes the game! The crowd COMES UNHINGED. Astrid flies over the crowd, basking in her victory.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Yep. Berk is pretty much perfect. All of my hard work has paid off. And it's a good thing, too, because with Vikings on the backs of dragons, the world just got a whole lot bigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 0300 - AWOL Part One) A boundless sky. Vast. Clear. Crisp. And from it, a BLACK SPECK rockets across the horizon. The image of unbridled freedom. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 7.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tucked into his riding position, HICCUP appears to be par TOOTHLESS. They dip, roll and dive, over a sea teeming wi Thunderdrums, pulling off daring maneuvers with honed refinement, making them seem effortless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! They jackknife, heading skyward, rolling and tumbling thr the ethereal cloud-scapes and joining high-flying Timberj as they soar in formation. Hiccup is bound head-to-toe in a snug, aerodynamic flight suit -- an asymmetrical, functional design of leather and articulated plates. It has an air of Viking bike leather.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do you think, bud? Wanna give this another shot?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless grumbles in protest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless! It'll be fine. With a click of a lever, he LOCKS the pedals in the flare tail position. Hiccup then unhooks himself from the saddl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready? Toothless SNORTS unenthusiastically. Suddenly, Hiccup SLIDES OFF of Toothless, peeling away fr him like a skydiver from a plane, YELLING as he plummets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless dives after him. They spiral through the air, f to-face. Toothless is having fun, despite himself. Hiccup slips his forearms through a pair of tucked leathe flaps... and YANKS, unfurling SHEETS OF LEATHER as he ext his arms. They catch the wind, SNAPPING OPEN like WINGS.. and sending him GLIDING -- out of control, at first, then stabilizing. The turbulence buffets his flight suit heavi But he's flying! Toothless unfolds his wings, too, catching up with Hiccup The freedom is palpable. Hiccup and Toothless are, for th moment, the same. Feeling the same rush of adrenaline. Independently together. They PLUNGE past cloud formations, splitting apart then crossing paths again. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 8.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Impressive as it is, Hiccup is gliding at a steep angle. Toothless launches fireballs ahead of Hiccup, boosting hi higher with the expanding heat bursts.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is amazing! A cloud layer washes past, exposing a towering ROCK FORMATION, dead ahead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No longer amazing! Toothless! Hiccup tries to steer himself away, to no avail. Toothless POURS ON THE SPEED, trying to catch Hiccup as h HURTLES toward collision. His locked tail makes maneuveri difficult. He's UNABLE TO PULL UP at a steep enough angle

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no! At the last second, Toothless BLASTS the jagged rocks jus ahead of Hiccup, then WRAPS Hiccup in his wings as they f through it. The obliterated peak rains down around them. Toothless emerges through the cloud of debris and HURTLES into the trees of a neighboring peak. They tumble down th uneven terrain, coming to rest on a small plateau. Hiccup emerges from the cocoon of Toothless' wings. He switches his prosthetic riding foot to his walking foot a stows his leather wings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That really came out of nowhere. The blown up sea stack collapses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta work on your solo gliding there, bud. That locked-up tail makes for some pretty sloppy rescue maneuvers, eh? Hiccup reels in his dorsal fin and removes his helmet, revealing a 20 year old Hiccup framed by wild hair, compl with a Viking braid. He walks to the edge of the cliff, taking in the NEW LAND stretching off into the horizon, its tall cliffs and sea- stacks adorned with swaying gold birch trees basking in t dappled afternoon sunlight. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 9.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks like we found another one, bud. Toothless FUSSES and SNORTS, not amused, shaking off dust pebbles like a wet dog. Hiccup flinches as a pebble WHACKS him on the back of the head. He looks back to Toothless, who averts his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, what? Do you want an apology? Is that why you're pouting, big baby boo? Well... try this on! Hiccup TACKLES Toothless and tries to put him in a headlo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ya feeling it yet? Huh? Picking up on all my heartfelt remorse? Toothless simply stands on his hind legs, lifting Hiccup of his flailing feet and dangling him over the cliff's ed

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, come on. You wouldn't hurt a

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup looks down, seeing the precipitous drop below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're right! You're right! You win! You win! WHAM! Toothless flips him over, pinning him to the ground Hiccup squirms, throwing mock punches. Toothless playfull retaliates with feline taps to Hiccup's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's down! And it's ugly! Dragons and Vikings, enemies again, locked in combat to the bitter -- URFFF! Toothless rests his head on Hiccup -- SQUEEZING THE AIR o of him. Toothless then suddenly starts grooming Hiccup, lapping at his face and covering him in slobber.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gaaaaagh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup fights to get free, finally springing to his feet shaking off the viscous saliva. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 10.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You KNOW that doesn't wash out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless LAUGHS, pleased with himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shifting his attention back to the new land stretched out before them, Hiccup reaches beneath his chest plate and produces a leather-bound book.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He unfurls it to reveal an EXPLORERS MAP, modified with a strips in every direction to accommodate their ever-expan world. Drawings indicate new lands, new tribes, and many dragons. Hiccup peels a fresh strip of paper from a hidden fold in flight suit and holds it out for Toothless to lick. Hiccup affixes the moistened strip to the map's outer edg then whittles a pencil and consults a compass affixed to forearm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what should we name it? Toothless GURGLES as he gnaws under his wing, preoccupied

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: "Itchy Armpit" it is. Hiccup carefully draws the new island's outline.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whaddya reckon, bud? Think we might find a few Timberjacks in those woods? The odd Whispering Death or two in the rocks? Who knows... maybe we'll finally track down another Night Fury.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wouldn't that be something?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So, whaddya say? Just keep going? Toothless' ear plates suddenly SHOOT UP. He ROARS, and hi call is answered by a familiar SCREECH. Hiccup turns to see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 0325 - AWOL Part Two)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ASTRID rising into view, astride Stormfly. Stormfly grabs talon-fulls of rock to slow her landing. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 11.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: `Afternoon m'lady. Where have you been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid dismounts and throws back her fur hood as Toothles rushes up to greet them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Winning races. What else? The real question is... where have YOU been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Avoiding my dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no. What happened now?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid sits beside Hiccup, inspecting his latest addition the map. Behind them, Toothless greets Stormfly, inciting play fight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, you're gonna love this. I wake up. The sun's shining. Terrible Terrors are singing on the rooftop. I saunter down to breakfast, thinking all is right with the world, and I get...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gets to his feet and puffs out his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Son, we need to talk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid smiles and adopts Hiccup's sloppy slouch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not now, Dad. I've got a whole day of goofing off to get started.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup breaks character, grimacing at her impression of h

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, first of all, I don't sound like that. What is this character? And second... what is that thing you're doing with my shoulders?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid laughs, jostling her shoulders in an awkward way. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 12.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A truly flattering impersonation. Anyway, he goes... (resuming Stoick's brogue) You're the pride of Berk, son, and I couldn't be prouder...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (continuing her impression

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aw, thanks, Dad. I'm pretty impressed with myself, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHEN have I ever done that with my hands?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You just did.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She laughs, playfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay... just... (holding her arms, mock-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold still. It's very serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She giggles, trying to hold a straight face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (resuming Stoick's brogue) You're all grown up, and since no chief could ask for a better successor, I've decided--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid straightens, her face brightening.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --TO MAKE YOU CHIEF! Oh, my gods!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She jumps to her feet, beaming...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup, that's amazing!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And socks Hiccup in congratulations, deliberately hitting dorsal fin release button and triggering it to pop up. Sh laughs as Hiccup reels it back in, self-consciously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna wear out the spring coil. The calibration is very sensitive! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 13.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're suddenly BOWLED OVER by Toothless and Stormfly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, so... this is what I'm dealing with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid helps him up and dusts him off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did you tell him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I didn't. By the time he turned around, I was gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid picks up the map, folding it as she paces around h processing it all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it's a lot of responsibility. The map will have to wait for sure, and I'll need to fly Toothless, since you'll be too busy...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pauses, wincing in sympathy. She turns to Hiccup. He knowingly, taking the map from her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not me, Astrid. All those speeches, and planning, and running the village... that's his thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I think you're missing the point. I mean, chief. What an honor. I'd be pretty excited. Hiccup shakes his head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not like you. You know exactly who you are. You always have. But...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He shuffles to the cliff's edge, gazing out at the new la

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm still looking. I know that I'm not my father... and I never met my mother... so, what does that make me? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 14.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He sits at the edge, looking burdened, restless. Astrid approaches and settles beside him, joining him in looking at the distant horizon. She weaves another braid into his hair as she speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What you're searching for... isn't out there, Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She places a hand on his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe you just don't see it yet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She kisses his cheek, but gets a mouthful of Toothless' slobber. She grimaces, wiping it off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Distracted, Hiccup eyes the horizon keenly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe. But, y'know... there is something out there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns her face to the horizon. A distant smoke plume r from a misty valley.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 0400 - Shot Down!) Hiccup and Toothless fly over the fjord, winding deep thr undulating crimson and gold forests.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid and Stormfly catch up as the autumn colors suddenl give way to charred timbers. They fly deeper, through ash wafting smoke. Ahead, in a sheltered harbor, an explosion ice stands as an eerie marker of what used to be a TRAPPE FORT.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stay close.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They fly through the suspended remains of the buildings, splintered, and frozen in mid-destruction.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What happened here? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 15.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's at once harrowing and puzzling. Toothless spots an enormous DRAGON FOOTPRINT in the muddy shoreline below, leaving him uneasy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy, bud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As they crest the ice formations, Astrid spots a CREW OF at the stern of a moored ship below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup!

dialogues.speaker: ERET, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Fire!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The men fire a stern-mounted cannon. The projectile unfur into a NET. Hiccup and Toothless dart out of its way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid! Look out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It HITS Stormfly, TANGLING her wings and causing her to s uncontrolled. Astrid struggles to free her as they HURTLE toward a collision.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid falls off of Stormfly, but Toothless SNATCHES her the last second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormfly hits the ground, tangled in the net. Trappers ru out of hiding, piling onto her with ropes and weapons. Sh whips her tail, sending spikes flying.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch the tail!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A large, raven-haired trapper lunges over the spray of sp and lands upon Stormfly's head, twisting it and taking he down like a rodeo cowboy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Tie those legs up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret deftly ties her gnashing jaws shut, wrangling her in submission -- clearly a pro among pros. He looks up, revealing a handsome face and gleaming, intelligent eyes search the sky as Toothless' tell-tale BANSHEE scream rin out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Is that what I think it is? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 16.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless suddenly streaks across the sky, banking and landing with a FEROCIOUS ROAR.

dialogues.speaker: STORMFLY
dialogues.text: (to the trappers) What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid and Hiccup leap off of Toothless, rushing toward Stormfly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret's men immediately draw weapons. Hiccup extends and ignites his DRAGON BLADE -- a telescoping fiery sword -- impressive enough to wow Eret's men.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Back again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret steps forward, focused only on Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soil my britches... that is a Night Fury. Thought they were all gone for good. (to his fellow trappers) Looks like our luck's had a turn for the better, lads! Don't think Drago has one of those in his dragon army.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His men sound out in agreement. Hiccup eyes Astrid, confu

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragon army?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, we don't want any trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha! You should've thought of that before you stole all of our dragons and blasted our fort to bits!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you talking about?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid and Hiccup take in the icy destruction, putting it together. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 17.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You think we did this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragon trapping is hard enough work as it is, without do-gooder dragon riders sneaking in to rescue them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What do-gooder -- there are other dragon riders?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You mean, other than your thieving friend from last night? You tell me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret approaches. Toothless snarls, protectively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You may have an ice-spitting dragon on your side, but we still have a quota to fill. How do you suppose we explain this mess to Drago Bludvist?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago what-fist? Does anything you say make sense?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's expecting a new shipment of dragons for his army by tomorrow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And Drago don't take well to excuses. Eret parts his tunic, revealing a large branding-iron sca his torso, in the shape of a dragon skull, split by a swo

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is what he gave me last time I showed up empty-handed. He promised to be far less understanding in the future.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, we don't know anything about a dragon thief, or an ice-spitting dragon, or your lunatic boss and his dragon army, okay?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 18.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just give us back our dragon, and we'll go, strange, hostile person whom we've never met.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret bows playfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, where are my manners? I'm Eret. Son of Eret. Finest dragon trapper alive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He pulls a dagger from behind his back, waving it cockily His men ready their weapons and net cannons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After all, it's not just anyone who can capture a Night Fury.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless ROARS a warning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And this is Toothless. He says we're going. Now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heh. They all say that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret lunges toward them. Toothless BLASTS, bringing down massive spire of ice. It shatters as it hits the ground, forcing Eret and his men to dive out of the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Making quick use of the distraction, Hiccup re-ignites hi dragon blade and slashes through the ropes binding Stormf

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormfly! C'mon, go! Go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret gets to his feet in time to see Toothless and Stormf take to the air, carrying Hiccup and Astrid out of reach the volley of arrows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Sequence 0500 - Lock-Down!) HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 19.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The GANG joyrides past GOTHI'S house, scattering her assortment of terrible terrors. She waves a fist at them they sweep past, WHOOPING AND CHORTLING, leading us down to...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: THE UPPER PLAZA, where a GATHERED CROWD of Vikings and th dragons are cued up outside of Gobber's BLACKSMITH STALL, awaiting their turns. Stoick maneuvers through the crowd, spouting JOVIAL GREETINGS in passing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He makes a bee-line for GOBBER, who is busily grinding a metal dragon tooth into shape. A Zippleback waits patient his head cocked open like a car hood while the other head watches, sympathetically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any sign of him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber flips up his welding guard, revealing a matching a of unsoiled skin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, he's probably flown off the edge of the world by now. You sure you want that kid running the village? You can still delay your retirement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, he's ready. You'll see.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SUDDEN EXCITEMENT in the crowd heralds Hiccup and Astri return. They touch down on Toothless and Stormfly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Haha! There he is! (to Gobber, proving his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Huh? The pride of Berk!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup stows his helmet and heads toward Stoick with urge

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who finally decided to show up for work. Yay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry. Got held up. (privately, to Stoick) Hey, Dad, could I have a word?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Something you're itching to tell me? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 20.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not quite the itch you're thinking of, but yes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick hands him an apron and guides him to the front des

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good man! Now, lesson one. A chief's first duty is to his people. So...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick changes the rune on the "being served" placard.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Forty one? Forty --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could we just talk in private for--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --That's me! That's me! I'm next! (pushing his way through) I was ahead of you! Excuse me, I've been here all day!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STARKARD reaches the counter, giddy with excitement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, I want one of those high seaters, with lots of spikes and a big stowage compartment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Absolutely! You got it, sir!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick spins Hiccup around, steering him back into the sh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad, this is actually a little more important than building saddles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah-ah! Lesson two. No task is too small when it comes to serving your people. Excuse us, Grump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They step over the tail of a large, snoring oaf of a drag stirring him awake with a fussy start.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grump! You let the forge die down again! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 21.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grump coughs a slug of molten lava into the forge. It splatters everywhere, igniting a rash of fires. Hiccup si steps them as he gathers materials in the back of the sta Gobber pulls the fire extinguisher, dumping water everywh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it, Grump. You're going up for adoption!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick fills a toolbox with tools from Hiccup's workbench

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of these. And this...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- There you go! Go on. Have away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, seriously, I really need to tell you about this new land we came across.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another one?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fishlegs walks in, followed by the Twins and Snotlout.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Any new dragons?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick slaps a sheet of leather onto a dragon mold, and h Hiccup pencil. Exasperated, Hiccup begins tracing an outl as he speaks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We didn't stick around to find out. These folks weren't particularly friendly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, really? Your Night Fury and Deadly Nadder didn't bring them cheering to the rooftops?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber spins his prosthetic arm dispenser.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, this was different. Not the standard run-for-the-hills hoo-ha I've come to enjoy. These guys were trappers. Dragon trappers. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 22.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You should've seen their fort. All blown apart and stuck in giant spikes of ice. It was weird.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've never seen anything like it. And worst of all, they thought we did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber pops off his prosthetic tongs and selects a wire b from his dispenser...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Y'know, you two are gonna get yourselves in SERIOUS trouble one of these days. Not everyone appreciates this way of life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Which he uses to brush his mustache and eyebrows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick takes the sheet of leather to the table saw...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber's right, son. Best we keep to our own. Besides, you'll have more important uses for your time --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And pulls a lever, starting it up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (sing-songy, under his

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once we make the big announcement!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup pulls the lever, shutting the saw down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They are building a dragon army.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Silence fills the stall. Vikings exchange worried glances

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or at least the guy they work for is. Dargo Bloody Fist or something.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick's eyes widen. He turns to Gobber, with growing ala

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll bloody his fist with my face if he tries to take my dragon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or mine. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 23.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're such a moron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A beautiful moron.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut grumbles, revolted by their advances.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick grabs Hiccup by the shoulders, wide-eyed and inten

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bludvist? Drago Bludvist?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, yeah. Wait. You know him?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick rushes down a circular stone staircase into the va bustling cave that houses the dragon stables.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? Why?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup, Astrid, Gobber, and Toothless chase after Stoick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa, whoa, whoa. Wait! What is happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You heard the man! Lock it down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Behind him, the massive storm doors rattle as they're lowered.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No DRAGON or VIKING sets foot off this island until I give the word! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 24.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because some guy you knew is stirring up trouble in some faraway land?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick turns to Hiccup, gravely serious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because Drago Bludvist is a madman. Without conscience or mercy. And if he's built a dragon army... gods help us all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick continues on shouting orders, leaving Hiccup stewi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get them into their pens! Quickly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup chases around to confront Stoick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then let's ride back out there. We'll follow those trappers to Drago and talk some sense into him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. We fortify the island.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's our duty to keep the peace!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Peace is over, Hiccup. I must prepare you for war.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: War? Dad, if Drago's coming for our dragons, we can't wait around for him to get here. Let's go find him and change his mind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some minds won't be changed, Hiccup. Berk is what you need to worry about.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A chief protects his own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick heads off, calling out more orders...

dialogues.speaker: STALL
dialogues.text: HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 25.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... leaving Hiccup eyeing Toothless as the storm doors cl Astrid approaches him, seeing the determination on his fa

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup, don't.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have to.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He gives her a quick peck on the cheek.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup and Toothless BLAST PAST, heading for the exit.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They try to fly through one door, but it seals shut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless spins around and DIVES through the gap in the second lowering storm door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid and Stormfly blow past Stoick and slip through the storm door before it shuts, leaving Stoick fuming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 0700 - Eret's Lesson) Eret's ship carves a defiant path North, leaving the last glimpses of Lapland in its wake.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret stands on the bowsprit, eyeing the waves intently, searching the surface. He turns toward the deck, where hi crewmen man the gunwale cannons, sights trained to the sk

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep your eyes peeled, lads! With this wind, we'll reach Drago by daybreak, so best we fill this ship up with dragons and quick! It's no time to be picky. Not if we want to keep our -- HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 26.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... Eret?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret turns in the direction Ug is pointing to see a pair dragons flapping toward them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crewmen swing the net cannons toward the back-lit, silhouetted dragons, drawing ever closer.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Net `em, lads! Take `em down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret loads a cannon and takes aim. He spots Hiccup and As riding the dragons. His eyes narrow, determined.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not getting away this time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nets fly through the air. Hiccup and Astrid outmaneuver t and dive toward the ship, landing on the deck with a clat

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And here I was worried we might turn up empty-handed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid brandishes her axe in invitation. Hiccup indicates her to lower it, then holds up his hands in surrender.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope. It's your lucky day. We give up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret's crew exchange confused stares. As does Astrid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's one Night Fury, one Deadly Nadder, and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He dismounts Toothless and tosses a net over Astrid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... two of the finest dragon riders west of Luk Tuk. That oughtta make the boss happy, right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid grumbles. He takes her axe, hands it to Eret, and escorts Astrid past the men to the open live well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excuse us. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 27.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He leads Astrid down the ladder. She glares at him, plain hating the plan.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless tries to follow them, but Hiccup holds him back

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless, stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup flips the latch, lowering the grate as Eret watche confounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dragons don't really care for cramped spaces, so they'll just hang out with you. They won't be any trouble.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret's men nervously direct their swords and spears towar Toothless. HE SNARLS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unless you do that. Wooden boat, big ocean. How's your swimming?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not good.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A burst of flame erupts from the live well, causing the crewmen to jump back. Hiccup thrusts his Dragon Blade thr the grate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oops. Almost forgot. Can't have armed prisoners!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How is this a plan?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He retracts the blade and offers it up. A crewman cautiou takes it, looking it over. The pommel of the hilt is expelling green gas.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Just what every dragon trapper needs. One end coats the blade in Monstrous Nightmare saliva. The other sprays Hideous Zippleback gas. All it takes is a spark and...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A curious crewman clicks the lighter, igniting the gas. Hiccup ducks as the sudden explosion sweeps over the deck HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 28.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, yeah, there you go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless paws at the embers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once they see you as one of their own, even the testiest dragons can be trained, right, bud?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless gurgles and falls over.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me that!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret snatches the dragon blade and HURLS it overboard. Stormfly bolts after it...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What game are you playing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No game. We just want to meet Drago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And returns in a flash, dropping it at Eret's feet like a fetching dog, tongue wagging. Eret throws it again, frustrated. Stormfly returns with it just as quickly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Why?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Because I'm going to change his mind about dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret and his crew LAUGH. Astrid pokes out of the well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He can be really persuasive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup pets Toothless, thoughtfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Once you've earned his loyalty, there is nothing a dragon won't do for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Puh! You won't be changing any minds around here. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 29.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can change yours. Right here. Right now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup sets Toothless' tail in the locked, splayed positi Eret sneers, suspicious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: May I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Hiccup is snatched into the air! Dragons blur p

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1000 - Botched Rescue)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crewmen SCRAMBLE to the NET CANNONS as a FLURRY OF WI streak past, GASHING holes in the sails and SLICING throu rigging.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragon riders!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless SHRIEKS and bounds up the mast, spotting Hiccup the talons of a Monstrous Nightmare. Toothless relaxes, realizing that it's Hookfang.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Put me down! Snotlout! What are you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snotlout looks back to see if Ruffnut witnessed the save.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See how well I protect and provide? Ruffnut GRUMBLES at the incessant courting. A FLYING NET whizzes past her head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aggh! What is with all the nets?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey watch it! That was close...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut spots Eret, FIRING nets from the deck of the ship

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SLOW MOTION, sexy POV of Eret's glistening biceps, shuddering as he BLASTS the net cannon, aimed directly at her. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 30.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, my.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The net unravels in SLOW MOTION...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me likey.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... enveloping Ruffnut as she yields to it, blissfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Hiccup FLIPS upside-down in the Hookfang's talons and KICKS off, pulling his wing-suit flaps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret takes aim, but Astrid SHOVES him, throwing off the s

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup glides unsteadily towards the ship and collides wi its sail. He slides down the canvas and drops to the deck Toothless lands behind him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber and Grump land on the deck, scattering Eret's crew

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We're here to RESCUE you!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I DON'T NEED to be rescued!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The bow dips heavily as Stoick touches down on SKULLCRUSH He dismounts, fuming.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret blocks Stoick, cocky and confident.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, didn't you just pick the wrong ship, eh? I am Eret, son of --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick shoves his face aside, sending Eret SLAMMING into Grump. Before he can react, Gobber CLUBS Eret on the head sending him collapsing to the deck. Grump then sits on hi smothering him into submission. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 31.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (panting, suffocated) Get... this... thing... off... me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber turns to the other crewmen, with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyone else?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret's men eye the Vikings, armed and flanked by their dragons. They set down their swords.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's what I figured.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You. Saddle up. We're going home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Of all the irresponsible --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- I'm trying to protect our dragons and stop a war! How is that irresponsible?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup glares, frustrated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick SIGHS, realizing that he has to explain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Years ago, there was a great gathering of chieftains to discuss the dragon scourge we all faced.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A hulking, cloaked figure strides confidently into fire-l hall, interrupting a council meeting of Viking chieftains His face is masked in silhouette. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 32.

dialogues.speaker: STOICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Into our midst came a stranger from a strange land, covered in scars and draped in a cloak of dragon skin. He carried no weapon and spoke softly, saying that he, Drago Bludvist, was a man of the people, devoted to freeing mankind from the tyranny of dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON STOICK, some twenty years younger, seated in a throne, studying the impudent stranger with suspicion.

dialogues.speaker: STOICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: He claimed that he alone could control the dragons and that he alone could keep us safe, if we chose to bow down and follow him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Viking council erupts in mocking laughter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snotlout, Fishlegs, and the Twins snicker.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stupid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aye. We laughed, too...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Until he wrapped himself in his cloak and cried out, "Then see how well you do without me!"

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago Bludvist pulls the dragon skin cloak over himself a marches toward the door. Above, dragon fire rips through ceiling, bringing down flaming timbers, followed by drago covered in heavy metallic armor. They BLAST FIRE as panic ensues.

dialogues.speaker: STOICK, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: The rooftop suddenly burst into flames, and from it, armored dragons descended, burning the hall to the ground.

dialogues.speaker: BACK TO PRESENT
dialogues.text: HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 33.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I... was to only one to escape.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Twins, Snotlout, and Fishlegs exchange spooked glance

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Men who kill without reason cannot be reasoned with.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Maybe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup turns and stomps toward Toothless, determined. Ere watches intently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm still going to try.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup jumps onto Toothless and locks eyes with Stoick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is what I'm good at. And if I could change your mind... I can change his, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless and Hiccup TAKE TO THE AIR, leaving everyone stirring in awkward silence.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid mounts Stormfly, about to go after him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO! Lead the others back to Berk. I've had enough mutiny for one day.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid stirs, conflicted, as Stoick stomps toward Skullcrusher, fuming. He passes Ruffnut, who's busily fondling Eret's biceps as he lays crushed under Grump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooh, I like that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 34.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ugh! Okay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1100 - Ambushed!) Hiccup stares ahead, frustrated, as Toothless glides over bed of clouds, glowing in the low, Arctic sun. Hiccup YELLS, then slumps back onto the saddle. Toothless recoils, sensitive to Hiccup's upset. The steam from their breath mixes in the frigid air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't worry, bud. I'm not gonna let anything happen to you. I promise. Toothless' ear plates perk up. He glances over his should to see a disturbance in the blanket of clouds. A strange and arresting MASKED WARRIOR rises from the clo standing upon something unseen. Its armor and cape flap i the buffeting turbulence. The warrior eyes Toothless and Hiccup, pulling up alongsi them. Hiccup senses the approaching figure in his periphe and sits up, flustered.

dialogues.speaker: AW, COME ON, DAD
dialogues.text: He whirls around expectantly then FREEZES, mouth agape. The warrior stares blankly, tilting his head in curiosity while cutting a menacing silhouette. Then, just as gradually as he rose, the warrior dips back beneath the clouds, disappearing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No sudden moves. Suddenly, the warrior EXPLODES out of the clouds before t standing atop a large dragon. They circle Hiccup and Toothless, forcing them to TREAD AIR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior points a staff toward Hiccup, unnervingly, as returns to face them. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 35.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on, hold on. Toothless GROWLS a warning. Suddenly, they're ambushed from behind. Hiccup is plucked of Toothless by another DRAGON and carried off.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless! With the tail unmanned, Toothless PLUMMETS helplessly. He FLAPS wildly then CRASHES through the ice into the black, frigid water. FLAILING and CRYING OUT, he struggles to st afloat as he watches... Hiccup disappear into the night sky, carried off in the talons of the strange dragon -- one of TENS that accompan the warrior in a cavalcade. Toothless BELLOWS in distress, desperately trying to take the air. As he LEAPS and CRASHES, time and again... A group of SPINY DORSAL FINS split the ice, carving a pat toward Toothless. Beneath the ice, a pod of SEASHOCKERS approach, two-heade with Manta Ray like wings GLIDING silently in the gloom. Fixated on Hiccup, Toothless is caught by surprise as the Seashockers surface and DRAG HIM UNDER. Hiccup's helmet bobs to the surface, marking all that remains.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1300 - Dragon Lady)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup shivers in the claws of the dragon, surrounded by strange flock full of breeds he's never seen. He looks ba for Toothless, now long gone.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior offers no response, seemingly immune to the c as he leads the dragon flock across the polar night -- an alien landscape, harsh and foreboding. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 36.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Out of the fog looms an EPIC ICE FORMATION -- jagged, spi and similar to the icy aftermath of Eret's fort, but many times its size.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The DRAGON ESCORT dives into its jagged folds.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The WILD RIDE suddenly gives way to a MULTILEVEL, CAVERNO CHAMBER made of ice and columns of basalt rock. It's heav populated with dragons of all kinds, looming in the shado

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup is dropped in the center. He scrambles to his feet calling out into the darkness.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to head back for my dragon!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A HISSING dragon CLOSES IN, sniffing, leering, aggressive

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup extends and lights his telescoping dragon blade, waving a swirl of fire around himself. The dragon pauses, intrigued, and then watches hypnotically as Hiccup pacifi him with calculated sweeps of the fiery blade.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior watches keenly from the shadows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Several aggressive dragons close in behind Hiccup. Hearin their hisses, he quickly stows the blade, replaces a cartridge in its hilt, then flips it around and sprays a perimeter of Zippleback gas around himself. He clicks the lighter, igniting a flash ring. The testy dragons recoil.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He then reaches through the smoke, offering his open hand The dragons re-approach, sniffing him with calmed curiosi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... tilting his masked head, curious. He dismounts his dr and approaches Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who are you? The Dragon Thief? Drago Bludvist?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior circles Hiccup in silence, taking in his gear his dragon blade, his face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you even understand what I'm saying? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 37.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior whirls and HAMMERS his staff. In response, a large dragon ASCENDS from the depths, carrying...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless is dumped on the ground next to Hiccup, sopping wet. Hiccup rushes to him, petting him reassuringly. Toothless coos in relief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay. I'm glad to see you, too, bud. You really had me worried there.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior rattles his staff at a nearby dragon. In response, it and the surrounding dragons produce fireligh from their throats, spotlighting Hiccup and Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior sets down his staff and shield, then approach Hiccup, cautiously and animal-like.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless SNARLS and circles Hiccup defensively, but then instantly yields to the stranger's outstretched hand. Wit quick, disarming gesture, the warrior lays Toothless down a state of bliss. Hiccup is astounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior's hand continues toward Hiccup's face. He recoils, but the warrior persists, finding the faint scar Hiccup's chin, glinting in the firelight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior GASPS and retreats a few steps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (whispered, shaken) Hiccup?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could it be? After all these years? How is this possible?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The voice is surprisingly female.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, should I... should I know you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. You were only a babe...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The warrior slowly removes the strange mask, revealing VA 40, beneath. Her eyes meet his, equally wide-eyed and agh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... but a mother never forgets. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 38.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup stammers, tongue-tied, aghast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Sequence 1325 - Searching)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick and Gobber search over the frigid waves that lap against the pack ice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Boar-headed! Just like his mother! She could never stay put either.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber glances over at Stoick, who's hunched over, brow furrowed and solemn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, he's just twenty. And a Viking. I mean, could there be a worse combination? Ha! When I think of how stubborn and senseless YOU were back in the day... well, not much has changed, actually.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You know what he's like. He won't give up, Gobber. And if Hiccup finds Drago, before we find him...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bah! NOTHING can hurt Hiccup so long as that Night Fury's around. It's a Night Fury! Framed by a hole in the ice, a glistening object bobs on surface below. Stoick squints and CIRCLES BACK, leading Skullcrusher in a DIVE toward it. Stoick SNAGS it out of water. It's Hiccup's helmet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber pulls alongside Stoick, seeing his look of dread. Stoick holds the helmet out for his dragon to SMELL.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Find him, Skullcrusher. Find him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skullcrusher SNIFFS the helmet like a bloodhound, ROARS, suddenly CHANGES HEADING. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 39.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1400 - A New Family)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: CLOSE ON Hiccup, flustered, winded, chasing VALKA through tightly winding corridors.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on! Wait just a minute! Come back here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This way. Come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You can't just say something like that and run off! You're my mother?! I mean, what the -- do you grasp how INSANE it sounds?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have questions!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come. Quickly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup follows her over the difficult terrain. He tries t clamber over a tall rock, unsuccessfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where have you been all this time?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless boosts him over. Hiccup lands on the other side

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What've you been doing?! They said you were dead! Everyone thinks you were eaten by... Hiccup trails off as he enters...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... a stadium-sized chamber teeming with ferns, waterfall hot springs and THOUSANDS of new DRAGONS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup wanders in, basking in the in the amazing sight: a dome of sweating ice capping a geothermal micro climate, filled with dragons of every shape and kind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He spots Valka clinging to a basalt overhang, watching hi HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 40.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is where you've been for twenty years?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods from her perch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You've been rescuing them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She nods again, this time with a smile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Unbelievable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're not upset?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? No. I don't know. It's a bit much to get my head around, to be frank. It's not every day you find out your mother is some kind of crazy, feral, vigilante dragon lady.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka chuckles, and using her dragon's wing, lowers herse to the ground like a skilled acrobat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: At least I'm not boring... right?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I suppose there is that... (feeble, trailing off) ... one... specific... thing...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Excited dragons rush up to greet Hiccup and Toothless. Hi pets a few, marveling at the vast dragon utopia before hi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do you like it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't have the words.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless SNARLS in annoyance as the curious, smothering dragons SNIFF every part of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Can I... ? He's beautiful!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She reaches out to stroke Toothless, who PURRS at her tou HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 41.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Incredible. He might very well be the last of his kind.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She inspects his talons as Toothless rolls onto his back, nuzzling her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And look, he's your age! No wonder you get along so well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup smiles, astounded by Toothless' affection for Valk She checks his teeth. They recede into the gums at her to

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And retractable teeth? Ah! How did you manage to--

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: --I found him in the woods. He was shot down and wounded.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She winces and offers a sympathetic nod as she stands to caress a few of her own rescued dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This Snafflefang lost his leg to one of Drago Bludvist's iron traps. This Raincutter had her wing sliced by razor netting. And this poor Hobblegrunt was blinded by a tree snare... then left to die alone and scared. (re: Toothless' tail) And what of this? Did Drago or his trappers do this, too?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heh. Well, crazy thing is... I'm actually the one who shot him down.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She glares, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's okay though. He got me back. (playfully, to Toothless) Right, bud? You couldn't save all of me, could you? You just had to make it even. So... peg leg!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup rattles his prosthetic leg with a smirk. Valka observes their playful rapport with curiosity. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 42.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What did your father think of your Night Fury friend?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He didn't take it all that well.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She mutters in agreement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But then... he changed. They all did. Pretty soon everyone back home had dragons of their own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles at Toothless, dismissive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If only it were possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, really, I --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Believe me, I tried, as well. But people are not capable of change, Hiccup. Some of us... were just born different.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragons sweep from the sky, blowing FIRE, carrying off sh and dried fish. Vikings chase them down, hurling weapons.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Berk was a land of kill or be killed, but I believed peace was possible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Viking is about to finish off a felled dragon, but Valk chases up to him and tugs at his arm.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stop! You'll only make it worse!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dragon takes wing, escaping to safety... leaving the Viking warrior glaring at Valka.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: It was a very unpopular opinion. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 43.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As he rushes off, Valka hears a clatter and whirls around see a DRAGON (Cloudjumper) clawing its way through the ro of a house.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Cloudjumper enters the house through the hole in the roof sniffing out a baby's cradle in the corner.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka rushes in, panicked.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: One night, a dragon broke into our house, finding you in the cradle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka draws a sword quietly, slipping up to the dragon, o to find it huddled protectively over the cradle as BABY HICCUP innocently plays with one of its talons.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: I rushed to protect you, but what I saw... was proof of everything I believed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka's careful approach causes a floorboard to squeak. Spooked, Cloudjumper whips around to face her, accidental SCRATCHING baby Hiccup's chin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Their eyes meet. Valka lowers her sword, transfixed.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: This wasn't a vicious beast, but an intelligent, gentle creature, whose soul reflected my own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick's AXE spins through the air between them, barely missing Cloudjumper and planting into a pillar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka, run!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Alarmed, Cloudjumper WHIRLS around at Stoick and BLASTS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick DIVES out of the way as the FIRE SPLATTERS against wall, burning a hole and setting the room ablaze.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dragon moves toward Stoick, but Valka grabs hold. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 44.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It turns to face her again, locking eyes, agitated.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick dashes through the fire toward Hiccup and pulls hi out of the cradle. He pulls his axe from the pillar...

dialogues.speaker: VALKA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: No! Stoick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... but in a WHOOSH of smoke and embers, the dragon and V are GONE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick and baby Hiccup watch helplessly as the dragon spi Valka away into the night sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON BABY HICCUP'S FACE, with the fresh nick on his chin...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HICCUP'S FACE, with the matching scar.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You and your father nearly died that night, all because I couldn't kill a dragon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, it runs in the family.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It broke my heart to stay away, but I believed you'd be safer if I did. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 45.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup considers this, then raises his eyes to hers, seei the sting of remorse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How did you survive?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, Cloudjumper never meant to harm me. He must've thought I belonged here...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She leads him to the edge of raised natural terrace, overlooking the steamy oasis with its flowing hot spring waterfalls. Half-submerged in the warm lake below, a mass white dragon with pronounced, mammoth-like tusks rests benevolently on the banks, his stately countenance like t of a lion surrounded by his pride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the home of the great Bewilderbeast. The alpha species. One of very few that still exist.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every nest has its queen, but this is king of all dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragons land and bow reverentially to the Bewilderbeast. Valka gestures to the spiked ice ceiling that acts as a sweating greenhouse.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With his icy breath, this graceful giant built our nest. A safe haven for dragons everywhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On HICCUP, putting it together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wait, that's the ice-spitter? He's responsible for all that destruction?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He protects us. We all live under his care. And his command.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They pass an eggshell-littered NURSERY. HATCHLINGS dart o of it, greeting them excitedly and inciting chaos. Toothl is overwhelmed by their manic picking and scratching. Cloudjumper balks and sends them scattering.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All but the babies, of course... HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 46.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The hatchlings clamber on top of the Bewilderbeast and pl on his massive tusks, despite his authority. Valka laughs

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... who listen to no one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast lets out a frosty SNORT, sending off th youngsters to spread more mischief.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now awakened, The Bewilderbeast raises his gargantuan hea take a closer look at Hiccup, coming eye to massive eye. Valka bows in his presence. As does Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've lived among them for twenty years, Hiccup, learning their ways, discovering their secrets...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He acknowledges Hiccup with another icy snort, slicking b Hiccup's hair in a frosty veneer. Valka laughs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He likes you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Wow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She chuckles, delighting in his awe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You must be hungry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, yeah. I could eat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good. It's feeding time. Toothless tucks himself beneath Cloudjumper's wing, tryin befriend him, but Cloudjumper isn't having any of it. He grimaces and follows Valka out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1200 - Astrid Takes Charge)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid and Stormfly circle a lone iceberg, being used as rest stop for the Gang and their dragons. She lands with frown, eyeing the distance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't like it. They should've been back with Hiccup by now. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 47.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't like it either. Eret son of Eret was the man of my dreams. My everything!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, baby, I grew facial hair for you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fishlegs strokes his peach fuzz beard, meek and dejected.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What if Drago shot them down? What if they need our help?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to find them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? But Stoick said...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It doesn't matter what he said, if they've all been captured. Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She flies off, determined.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret's ship is beset by ice floes. The crew stirs on deck he paces, grumbling, while nursing his head with a large chunk of ice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do we go back?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've nowhere to go! Nothing to sell! And no heads to call our own, if we don't turn up with dragons and fast --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's suddenly scooped up in Stormfly's talons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Careful what you wish for!

dialogues.speaker: ERET SON OF ERET
dialogues.text: HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 48.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nets whiz past as Astrid and the Gang rocket out of range

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What is this?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A kidnapping.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut grabs his leg, clutching him possessively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yay! Can he ride with me? Can he? Can he?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Both Eret and Tuffnut groan in protest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're gonna show us the way to Drago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And help dragon riders sneak into Drago's camp? Just kill me now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That can be arranged. Stormfly, drop it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In enthusiastic response, Stormfly pops open her talons, sending Eret plummeting. He wails and flails as he hurtle toward the ice far below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good girl! Stormfly, fetch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
