dialogues.text: She dives after him, just as enthusiastically. ON ERET, terrified, as the ground rushes up at him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormfly suddenly SNATCHES him out of his free-fall just before hitting the ice. Astrid giggles and cracks her knuckles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Works every time. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 49.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1600 - Momma's Boy)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup and Toothless follow Valka and Cloudjumper over a majestic fjord in the long rays of the low Arctic sun.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup peers over his shoulder to see that a thick flock dragons -- nearly all of Valka's rescues -- are close on their tail. He turns back to his mother, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey, I thought we were going to eat?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (with a mischievous grin) Oh, we are.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She directs his gaze below, where in the choppy water of fjord, a group of Seashocker dragons are corralling a den shoal of fish near the surface.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, the Bewilderbeast rises from deep below, scoopi the fish up in its vast mouth as its tusks break the surf It breaches just below Hiccup and Toothless, giving them fright before spitting the fish into the air and crashing back down into the sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka laughs at Hiccup's surprise as the hungry dragons r for the flailing fish, scooping them out of the air. Hicc gestures to Toothless to join in and he gladly scoops up mouth full.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup has his map spread out in the snow, explaining the various lands he's discovered during his explorations.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And from Dragon Island, I found this archipelago...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks up to see that Valka is no longer next to him, b she has sketched out the rest of the northern land masses the snow, wowing Hiccup with just how far and wide she ha explored. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 50.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She returned to Hiccup's side with a smile. But his amaze is interrupted by Toothless joining in, drawing all over Valka's map with a giant icicle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup simply shrugs as his mother giggles, and Cloudjump sneers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka and Hiccup rise on their dragons, carried skyward b strong coastal wind that thrusts vertical up shoreline cl

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One by one, dragons leap from the cliff and catch the str updraft, popping their wings open like kites. They ride t wind and orbit around each other in a colorful, mesmeric dance. It's clearly a form of dragon play.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup, lifted off of his saddle by the force of the wind laughs giddily as he watches Valka walk across Cloudjumpe wing and onto several others, dragon-hopping from one to another, until she gracefully crosses Toothless from wing to wing tip. She then drops out of sight, reappearing a moment later standing atop Cloudjumper. Hiccup is in utte awe of her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka breathes in the frigid air. Lets it out blissfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: When I'm up here, I don't even feel the cold. I just feel...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles at Hiccup. He gleams back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is what it is to be a dragon, Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup LOCKS the pedals in the flared tail position and unbuckles himself. Valka watches, curious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all well and good to call yourself a dragon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup RUNS OFF of Toothless, pulling his stowed wings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But can you fly?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They catch the air, SNAPPING OPEN... and sending him GLID HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 51.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka GASPS, astonished. She flies her dragon alongside h marvelling, as...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... Hiccup SOARS, riding the wild air currents like an ea the image of freedom. Toothless descends steadily with hi hovering protectively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup grins, pleased at having impressed Valka... until realizes that he is once again racing toward a collision a fast approaching mountain top.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh no. Toothless!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, with his tail locked, Toothless can't make the tight jackknife turn skyward to rescue Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Realizing that they're in trouble, Valka and Cloudjumper on the speed. All four of them collide just as they reach mountain top, sending them crash-landing in an explosion snow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They all TOPPLE head over tail to a messy landing on the swept ridge and pop up LAUGHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Man! Almost! We just about had it that time!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless raises his snow-packed face, glowering. He tail swipes Hiccup off of his feet and back into the powder.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka inspects Hiccup's wing suit with utter fascination.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Incredible.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, not bad yourself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She caresses his cheek, staring deep into his eyes. Hiccu doesn't recoil this time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All this time, you took after me. And where was I?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm so sorry, Hiccup. Can we start over? Will you give me another chance?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup smiles, a simple acknowledgement that all is forgi HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 52.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I can teach you all I've learned, these past twenty years. Like...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka finds a spot at the top of Toothless' neck and rubs a circular pattern. In response, his dorsal blades slowly crack, split and extend, forming a pronounced, aerodynami `V' down the length of his back and tail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now you can make those tight turns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless shudders, as if experiencing a much-needed chiropractic adjustment. He bounds over to Hiccup, giddil retracting and splaying his dorsal blades like a kid with new toy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Did YOU know about this?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka smiles, delighting in their mutual amazement.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Every dragon has its secrets.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless pounces around, showing off to Cloudjumper, who seems thoroughly unimpressed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I'll show them all to you. We'll unlock every mystery, find every last species, together, as mother and son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This gift we share, Hiccup... it bonds us. This is who you are, son. Who we are. We will change the world for all dragons! We will make it a better, safer place!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That sounds... amazing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She pulls him into a hug -- forceful, bursting with emoti Hiccup hugs Valka back. They share a cathartic moment, be Hiccup peels away from her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is so great! Now you and I can go talk to Drago -- together!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She chuckles, incredulous. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 53.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What? There's no talking to Drago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But we have to --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- No. We must protect our own.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup stares, exasperated by the familiar line. Cloudjum lumbers over, eager to be rid of Toothless' puppy-like energy. Valka pets him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now come on, we should be getting back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Hiccup can say anymore, he hear heavy breathing ne to him, and looks over to see Toothless with a gaping gri clapping his dorsal blades.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1350 - Meet Drago)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid and the gang stealthily approach a cluster of tabu icebergs, collapsed against each other at the mouth of a maze. Stormfly drops Eret to the snow, but before he can flee, she lands atop him and nests like a hen with her eg

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agghh! Okay! I got you here, now get this thing off me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never take a toy from a dragon. Don't you know anything?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormfly crushes him in place under her weight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gah! Why does this keep happening to me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid crawls up the rising ridge to reveal...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A MASSIVE FLOTILLA, moored together like a floating camp the deep water between collided icebergs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thick chains run deep into the water, where great blasts bubbles erupt on the surface. The unseen creature rocks t ships. Its effect alone describes it as gargantuan. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 54.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's down there?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fishlegs rifles through his note cards contained in his b pouch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Large diameter bubbles, massive lungs, cold water deep dweller, I'm thinking class five leviathan, maybe six.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, Stormfly is alerted to an encroaching menace an takes wing. BLOW DARTS whiz through the air, hitting the other dragons. The effect is immediate -- they fall to th ground, unconscious. Drugged.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meatlug! What's wrong, girl?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret spring to his feet and draws his blades. Astrid and Gang find themselves surrounded by soldiers, camouflaged polar bear furs, and poised to fire darts. They're outnumbered. Fishlegs raises his hands, dropping the card

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DRAGO BLUDVIST, a hulking figure draped in a dragon skin cloak, crouches over the prow of the fleet's grisly flags adorned in massive dragon bones and skulls. His scarred f is masked by thick, grizzled dreadlocks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago turns to see Astrid, Eret, and the Gang being forci escorted onto the deck. Eret SHAKES HIMSELF FREE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get off me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the background, a sledge, loaded with Hookfang, Meatlu Belch and Barf -- all unconscious -- is dragged onto the by armored dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Always great to see you, my friend! Keeping warm up here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The soldiers disarm him, pushing him forward as Drago approaches. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 55.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, as you can see, I'm right on time with a new batch of dragons, just like I promised.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hookfang awakens, groggily shaking off the effect of the dart. He rears as soldiers struggle to reign him in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch out! He's waking up! Keep him steady!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Give me some backup here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drop the ropes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They do so. Hookfang bucks and roars, chasing off the soldiers, then focusing on Drago as he closes in. The arm dragons avert their eyes and cower as Drago passes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hookfang HISSES a warning, but Drago approaches, undaunte

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hookfang BLASTS. In a blur, Drago wraps himself in his dr skin cloak. The sticky, napalm-like fire splatters agains the fireproof scales, enveloping Drago in dripping flames he persists forward without missing a step.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the blast ends, Drago drops the cloak, closing in and holding a cold stare. Hookfang lets out a ferocious ROAR.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago YELLS back with a fierce, savage scream, interrupti Hookfang and causing him to recoil. Drago whirls his bull hook overhead and STABS it into the deck planks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hookfang stirs, his aggression fading in the face of Drag unflinching show of dominance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: After a moment, Hookfang averts his eyes and lowers his h in submission. Drago places his boot upon Hookfang's snou pressing it into the deck planks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hookfang!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hey!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What are you doing? HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 56.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (quiet, to the dragon) You belong to me now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And as an added bonus, I also caught you their riders. No extra charge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago notices the saddle on Hookfang's back. His eyes wan to the saddle on Meatlug. Alarm flashes in Drago's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?! Are you kidding me?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But you were so perfect!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Turns out, there's a whole bunch of them out there. They --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In a flash, Drago stops toward Eret and seizes him by the throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How many?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Eret chokes, stammering, Astrid whispers to the gang.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago doesn't have them after all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hundreds! A whole island full!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His grip tightens around Eret's neck as he turns to Astri

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I wouldn't worry about it. My men are hunting them down as we speak. They won't know where you're hiding. I promise you that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid nods a covert signal to the Gang -- she has a plan

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, yes they will!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago drops Eret as Astrid advances, staring Drago down. tries to signal her to stop, but it's no use. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 57.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They know we're missing and they have tracking dragons. If you so much as touch us, Hiccup is gonna

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Hiccup?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's not a problem. Really. Trust me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's only the son of Stoick the Vast...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago's eyes narrow upon hearing Stoick's name.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... his heir to the throne of Berk... and the greatest dragon master this world has ever seen!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragon master? I ALONE control the dragons!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Nope.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And unless you let us go, right now, he will blast through here on his Night Fury and blow your entire fleet of ships to splinters!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret slips away, trying to distance himself from the tens

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then they'll be crying like babies!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Funny and beautiful.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Good one, babe!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut groans, exasperated by their smarmy advances. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 58.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah. Like babies. They always cry. Real tiny ones...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago grabs Eret by the face and bears down on him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: First there was one rider. And now all of Berk.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And YOU led them to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He THROWS Eret across the deck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Soldiers CHEER in the thousands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're overreacting!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And get rid of him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago, please...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The soldiers HURL throwing knives at Eret... But Stormfly lands in a blur of wings, shielding Eret fro the flurry of blades. She whips her tail, throwing spikes all directions.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormfly ROARS protectively, hiding Eret within her wings until a well-blown dart sinks into her neck, bringing her down...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Revealing Eret, gawking in shock. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 59.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1800 - Family Reunion)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup reattaches his flight suit while standing on a led overlooking the utopian nest, teeming with dragons. Sever babies race in to hassle Toothless as he naps.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, bud, we can't wait around for Drago to attack this place. We've gotta find him first. Let's go.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a thick hand clamps down over Hiccup's face -- muffling his scream!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless whirls around to find STOICK, towering over Hic He calms Toothless with a touch and releases Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Easy now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Are you kidding me? How'd you get in here?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The same way we're getting you out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber appears in the arch of a tunnel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All clear!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless. Come.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They hurry back into the winding corridor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad! There's something you need to know!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, yeah, tell me on the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This isn't an on-the-way kind of update, actually... HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 60.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've heard ENOUGH, Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... more of the earth-shattering development variety.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, just add it to the pile.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad, unlike most surprises I spring on you, this is one you'll like. I promise! You just have to handle it delicately, so...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They round a tight bend in the corridor to find Gobber staring blankly at something unseen in the next chamber. shuffles past Stoick and Hiccup, dazed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, you might want to take this one. Oh, boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick draws his SWORD, then braves into the chamber ahea

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad, can you put the sword away... please?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick GASPS as if seeing a ghost... and drops his sword a clatter.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka stands some twenty paces ahead of him, blocking the path. She lets out an audible SHUDDER upon seeing him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He removes his helmet slowly as Hiccup, Gobber, and Tooth appear at Stoick's side.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know what you're going to say, Stoick. How could I have done this? Stayed away all of these years. And why didn't I come back to you? To our son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick steps towards her, wide-eyed and speechless. Drago emerge from the recesses behind Valka, hissing protective

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, what sign did I have that you could change, Stoick? That anyone on Berk could?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 61.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I pleaded so many times to stop the fighting, to find another answer, but did any of you listen?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This is why I never married.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This and one other reason.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick continues to close the gap, mesmerized. With every step, Valka becomes increasingly flustered. She backs int ice wall, with nowhere to go, and Stoick just a few paces away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I know that I left you to raise Hiccup alone... but I thought he'd be better off without me. And I was wrong, I see that now, but...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick gently reaches a hand toward her face.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh stop being so stoic, Stoick. Go on... SHOUT, SCREAM, SAY SOMETHING!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You're as beautiful as the day I lost you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His words snuff her retort, rendering her speechless. She softens despite herself, yielding her cheek to his palm. caresses her skin as a reluctant tear runs through his fingers. He PULLS her into a KISS. She resists briefly, t gives in. The surrounding dragons softly RETREAT in kind. Hiccup gapes, warmed by the sight of his parents reunited

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1750 - Eret's Turn)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago's massive flagship leads the flotilla, pulled along forcefully by whatever's at the other end of the enormous chain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago WHACKS the chain with his bullhook, spurring it forward.

dialogues.speaker: ON DRAGO'S SHIP
dialogues.text: HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 62.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret, Astrid, and the Gang are escorted to the stern, surrounded by several of Drago's soldiers. Wrists bound. Spear tips pressed into their backs.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Could this day get any worse?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, let me see. You'll jump into freezing cold water and then die from drowning.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They reach the gang plank. Eret peers overboard at the de icy water below.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Looks refreshing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to Astrid, meeting her glare with mock chivalry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please, ladies first.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A pair of soldiers GRAB Astrid by the arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You are a steaming heap of dragon --

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- Duck.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret WHIRLS around, ROUND-HOUSING both soldiers. They GO DOWN, heavily.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He catches one of their spears with his bound hands and slices his ropes free. They fall away as he catches the o spear, twirling both in invitation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Warn the others!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One soldier runs to send up the alarm... while the last t raise BLOW DART TUBES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret SWIPES the first off of his legs, sending the dart i the neck of the second.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get `em, you son of an Eret!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the downed soldiers SCRAMBLE to their feet, Fishlegs F OVER, CRUSHING them under his weight. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 63.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret CATCHES the falling tube from the second soldier and BLOWS the dart at the fleeing third. The soldier DROPS, unconscious -- just shy of the Captain's Quarters.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, I love you again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut skips past Snotlout on her way to Eret. Snotlout watches, crestfallen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ugh. Pathetic. You can still jump.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret avoids Ruffnut and turns to Astrid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So? Are we going to save your dragons and get out of here or not?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid narrows her eyes, not knowing what to make of him. reclaims his sword and dagger from the unconscious soldie who took them and cuts Tuffnut free.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Check every trap. They're here somewhere.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid slips under a tarp and cranks open a metal trap. S peers between its massive iron teeth, discovering Meatlug within, bound and chained to its base as bait.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Meatlug?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Carefully cranking another trap, wincing at the sound. Th iron jaws of the trap open wider with every CLICK.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Anyone coming?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut "stands guard," fixated on Eret's rippling biceps

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't know. You just keep doing what you're doing. Keep crankin'...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret squeezes between the cocked teeth, finding Stormfly within, muzzled and chained. She looks up at Eret, calmin immediately. He pauses, then approaches slowly. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 64.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret carefully reaches out and strokes Stormfly's muzzle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you for saving my life.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now let me return the favor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1850 - The Last Dance)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Toothless and Cloudjumper hover for scraps, Stoick and Valka prepare skewers of fish. She's overwhelmed, lost in thoughts, and covering it up poorly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Mom, you'd never recognize it! Where we used to make weapons, we now build saddles, wing slings -- we even fix dragon teeth! You wouldn't believe how much everything's changed!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka offers a skittish half-smile and hands him a plate.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Our son's changed Berk for the better. I think we did well with this one, Val.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick places his hands on Valka's shoulders. She flinche dropping the plate. Cloudjumper steals the fish before Toothless can get to i Toothless whimpers, and as a sign of acceptance, Cloudjum regurgitates the fish so Toothless can have some.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm... a little out of practice.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, y'know... I didn't marry you for your cooking.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to Hiccup and Grump) I hope not. Her meatballs could kill more beasts than a battle axe.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 65.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've still got a few knocking around in here. Ha ha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber takes a bite, gags, and dump the entire plate of f skewers into Grump's mouth like a trash can.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And once you move back in, with all of your dragons, Drago won't even stand a chance. Everything will be okay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick can see that Valka is overwhelmed. He lays a hand Hiccup's shoulder, calming him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Slow down, son. It's a lot to take in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh. Gotcha.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka crosses the room to fill a flask with water, back turned to the group, as Stoick eyes her sympathetically. decides on a different approach... and whistles a familia tune.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON VALKA, as her eyes widen, stirred, recognizing the mel She turns away from Stoick, as the water overflows from t flask.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, I love this one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick approaches her delicately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Remember our song, Val?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup watches him, curious, as Stoick FUMBLES THROUGH TH FIRST VERSE of an old Viking courting song:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll swim and sail on savage seas, with ne'er a fear of drowning. And gladly ride the waves of life, if you will marry me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka avoids his gaze, wallowing in a mess of emotions. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 66.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No scorching sun, nor freezing cold

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: -- will stop me on my journey! (catching himself,

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Sorry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick scowls at him, then returns his attention to Valka

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: If you will promise me your heart...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick pauses, setting Valka up for her part of the duet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And love...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick hangs eagerly, awaiting her words, but Valka close her eyes, rejecting his invitation. He lets out a heavy- hearted sigh. But nostalgia gets the better of Valka. She softly SINGS HER PART:

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And love me for eternity.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick beams. She brushes past him, setting into the cent of the chamber and holding her forearm aloft in invitatio Stoick crosses his forearm against hers, initiating a beautiful dance to accompany the song.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My dearest one, my darling dear, you mighty words astound me. But I've no need of mighty deeds, when I feel your arms around me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The dance is full of charming missteps as Stoick and Valk recreate a moment from their past, before Hiccup's wonder struck eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But I would bring you rings of gold. I'd even sing you poetry.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 67.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And I would keep you from all harm, if you'd stay here beside me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I have no use for rings of gold. I care not for your poetry. I only want your hand to hold. I only want you near me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber can't help himself. He drags Hiccup onto his feet that he can join in the dancing, too.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: C'mon, Hiccup!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VALKA, STOICK, & GOBBER

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To love and kiss, to sweetly hold. For the dancing and the dreaming. Through all life's sorrows and delights, I'll keep your love inside me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup is amazed by the sight of his giddy parents, spinn and laughing in each others' arms, reunited.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VALKA, STOICK, & GOBBER (CONT'D)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll swim and sail through savage seas, with ne'er a fear of drowning. And gladly ride the waves of life, if you will marry me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber carries the last note...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm still going...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup taps him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm done.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka and Stoick slow to a stop, WINDED and LAUGHING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah... I thought I'd have to die before we'd have that dance again. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 68.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No need for drastic measures.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For you, my dear... anything.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She smiles sweetly. Stoick's eyes well with tears. He goe down on one knee, proposing to her anew.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Will you come home, Val? Will you be my wife once again?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless nudges Valka closer to Stoick. They laugh as Hi joins them. Stoick throws his arm around him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can be a family! What do you say?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka, between tears and laughter, turns to Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yes!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber pops his head in.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Great! I'll do the cooking!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They laugh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank Odin you didn't listen to me, son. We never would have found each other. Suddenly, Toothless and Cloudjumper suddenly perk up, sen something unheard. Hiccup notices.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragons SWARM past Valka's chamber, racing toward some unknown disturbance.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What's happening?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're answered by subsequent HEAVY BOOMS that reverbera through the fortress. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 69.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 1900 - Surprise Guests)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka rushes out to find...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DRAGO'S ARMADA in the lagoon below and his forces of thousands now landed upon the beach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They launch catapults and ballistas into the icy spires, gaining entrance into the mountain's tunnels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup, Stoick, and Gobber catch up to Valka.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka tries to hurry off, fuming. Stoick stops her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Val! It's all right, it's all right. We're a team now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now what do you want to do?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She glances from Hiccup to Stoick.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We have to save the dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Aye. You got it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He throws an arm around Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VALKA'S DRAGONS SWOOP down to engage the attackers, picki up soldiers and carrying them off while Drago stands in t line of fire, unflinching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The catapults continue to bring down the icy defenses of dragon mountain. Drago's men pour into the tunnels.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whatever comes, keep hitting the mountain! We need to draw the alpha out. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 70.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago's armored DRAGON ARMY takes wing, clashing with Val dragons in the skies.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ready the traps!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Iron jaws are opened like bear traps, revealing screechin `bait' dragons within. Valka's dragons swoop down to resc them, only to be SNAPPED UP in the fearsome jaws.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A second set of traps are cocked open, but instead of dra cries, ZIPPLEBACK GAS seeps out... followed by an EXPLOSI The TWINS rocket out of the trap, riding BARF and BELCH.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Surprise! Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're joined by Astrid and the rest of the GANG, bursti out of the traps atop Meatlug and Hookfang.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret comes flying out last, WAILING aboard Stormfly. He struggles to hold on, as she rejoins Astrid (riding Meatl along with Fishlegs). He gives them a sheepish shrug.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You really are full of surprises.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She leaps onto Stormfly, steadying them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let's go!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Together they rocket across the sky...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragon Riders coming through!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And DIVE-BOMB the traps, setting them aflame. The yokes a leather bindings restraining the bait dragons are incinerated, freeing them to fly away, unharmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Projectiles are launched, one of which KNOCKS Ruffnut off dragon. She PLUMMETS past Eret toward the rocky shore bel

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Eret, son of Eret!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She suddenly grabbed by both arms before hitting the rock HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 71.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: RUFFNUT'S POV: of Snotlout on one side... and Fishlegs on other. SOFT and ROMANTICIZED as her epiphany dawns.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Above them, more catapults fire, bringing down massive sp of ice, directly over Astrid and Eret.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Up, girl! To the left, Eret! That's it! Look out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's about to crush them when... it's BLOWN TO PIECES by Toothless' fireball. Hiccup, Stoick, and Gobber come burs through the flames on their dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup and Toothless arc across the sky triumphantly and their sights on a downed dragon surrounded by soldiers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless BLASTS one of Drago's net launchers, knocking i onto its side. Stoick then CHOPS the trigger line, FIRING catapult and NETTING the throng of soldiers, freeing the dragon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago's ARCHERS target Stoick with their arrows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take `em down!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heads up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber flies up from behind, KNOCKING the archers out wit Grump's tail. Gobber chuckles.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DRAGO hears Toothless' tell-tale BANSHEE scream and turns see him streaking across the sky.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragon Master.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup catches up to Astrid and Eret on Stormfly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Welcome aboard, dragon rider!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thanks. I think.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid glares, both relieved and annoyed to see Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Where have you been?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, y'know. Catching up with Mom. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 72.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid shoots him a confused glare. He nods skyward. Astr and Eret look up to see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: VALKA, in full warrior garb, rising from the towering ice spikes, atop Cloudjumper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Whoa...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: An earth-trembling roar follows as the Bewilderbeast rise behind Valka.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's your mother?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, now you know where I get my dramatic flair.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON DRAGO, gawking in awe as the great BEWILDERBEAST BLAST an epic explosion of ice upon the attackers.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The alpha! Now we have a fight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka blasts overhead on Cloudjumper, commanding swarms o dragons to swoop down and attack Drago's army. A swarm of Zipplebacks set themselves aflame and roll like fiery wag wheels through the battlefield, scattering soldiers and destroying war machines.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: One of them gets CAUGHT under a Dragon Swatter, but Hiccu and Toothless double-back for a rescue.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There! Come on, Toothless! Show them what you got, bud. Toothless dive-bombs the swatter and DESTROYS it with a plasma bolt, freeing the dragon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thatta boy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK TO VALKA, on Cloudjumper as they pry Drago's armored dragons off of the flailing wild ones. A net suddenly envelops Cloudjumper. They CRASH heavily, but Valka cuts herself free, sliding to a stop just paces away from Drag

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I've waited a long time for this!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago cocks his bull hook, ready to strike, but Valka deflects Drago's hit and attacks him. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 73.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You cannot take our dragons! They are controlled by the alpha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then it's a good thing I brought a challenger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns to the flagship and YELLS savagely, whirling his bullhook overhead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The heavy chains are released. The underwater creature, n freed, breaks the surface in an epic cascade of seawater. rises toward the shoreline, revealing itself to be...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SECOND BEWILDERBEAST -- bigger, meaner, and covered in scars that indicate years of training and abuse. The chai fall away from iron cuffs fastened to its massive tusks.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka GASPS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Another one?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago's challenger lumbers onto the beach, focused on Val Bewilderbeast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No. No.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on! Take down the alpha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka attacks Drago with her bullhook, trying to stop his commands, but Drago strikes back, knocking her forcefully onto her back. He pins her as she struggles, removing her mask and staff. He's about to finish her off, when WHAM! knocked to the ground. He looks up, fuming, to see Stoick helping Valka to her feet.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: For you, my dear... anything. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 74.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Drago gathers his weapon and drops his heavy cloak, circling Stoick, Drago's Bewilderbeast confronts Valka's threat display.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Val, do you think you can stop them?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'll do my best! Come on, Cloudjumper!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka cuts the nets away and hops onto Cloudjumper, flyin off toward the Bewilderbeasts as they charge each other, CLASHING TUSKS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago LUNGES at Stoick, SWIPING his bullhook.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You... I watched you burn!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The two imposing warriors CLASH WEAPONS, SLASHING and LAN PUNCHES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It takes more than a little fire to kill me!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka flies between the Bewilderbeasts, waving her staff commandingly, but to no effect.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Drago hooks and yanks the axe out of Stoick's hands. Gobber flies by and HURLS his mace attachment.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick catches it and lands a direct hit on Drago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, with a devastating SWIPE, DRAGO's Bewilderbeast take down Valka's, plunging in its tusks and burying its opponent's lifeless body under an avalanche.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup and the others watch in horror as dragons everywhe land and bow their heads in acknowledgement of the new al - DRAGO'S ALPHA.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We've won. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 75.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago points his bullhook toward Valka and Cloudjumper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now finish her!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick whirls around, spotting Valka and Cloudjumper in t alpha's sights.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago's Bewilderbeast INHALES... and BLASTS! Valka steers Cloudjumper out of the way, but ice HITS his tail, causin them to SPIRAL out of control toward the icy spires.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He LEAPS onto Skullcrusher, spurring him into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Skullcrusher, go! Come on, Gobber!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick tosses the mace back to Gobber in passing, who fol brazenly, waving it aloft.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Right behind ya, Stoick!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 2000 - Stoick's Sacrifice)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With his tail impaired, Cloudjumper struggles against a throng of oncoming dragons. Valka is knocked off, but man to cling to her dragon's neck. As she loses her grip and FALLS...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick LEAPS from Skullcrusher and CATCHES Valka. He sink his axe into an icy column, and they slide to a safe land Drago's Bewilderbeast presses closer, sniffing them out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: BACK TO HICCUP, spotting Drago on the battlefield, comman the Bewilderbeast to finish the job.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: STOP! Stop!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup lands Toothless a few paces from Drago and brazenl removes his helmet. Drago eyes him, incredulous, then beg to CHUCKLE. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 76.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This... is the great dragon master? The son of Stoick the Vast? What shame he must feel.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless snarls, ready to blast, but Hiccup calms him wi hand gesture.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of this loss, and for what? To become unstoppable? To rule the world?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago smirks and turns away from Hiccup.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragons are kind, amazing creatures that can bring people together.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or tear them apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago LAUGHS mockingly, then removes his FALSE ARM, revea a stump at his shoulder. Hiccup is taken aback.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You see, I know what it is to live in fear. To see my village burned, my family taken.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He reattaches the prosthesis, circling Hiccup menacingly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But even as a boy, left with nothing, I vowed to rise above the fear of dragons and liberate the people of this world.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Then why a dragon army?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (grinning, smug) Well, you need dragons to conquer other dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or maybe you need dragons to conquer people.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To control those who follow you... and to get rid of those who won't. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 77.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Clever boy.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago grabs his bullhook and re-approaches Hiccup. Toothl readies himself.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The world wants peace. And we have the answer, back on Berk. Just let me show you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: NO! Let ME show YOU.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago SHRIEKS madly, summoning the Bewilderbeast. Toothle circles Hiccup, protectively.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON THE BEWILDERBEAST, about to blast Stoick and Valka. It hears Drago's distant wails, and approaches obediently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What...?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick follows its stare to the distant battlefield below spots Hiccup and Toothless a few paces from Drago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He rushes off. Valka follows, racing past Gobber as he finally joins them, winded from having run up the mountai

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, Gobber!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Okay, change of plans.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hurries back down the mountain after them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: jabbing his bullhook into the ground commandingly. The Bewilderbeast flinches and stops, submissive.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No dragon can resist the alpha's command. So he who controls the alpha, controls them all. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 78.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago points to Toothless. The Bewilderbeast stares and HISSES, forcing Toothless to cower under a hypnotic ultrasonic broadcast. Toothless struggles against the alp command, writhing and grinding his head against the groun

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless? You okay, bud? What's going on?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless fights the command, shaking his head in protest The Bewilderbeast insists, with a mesmerizing glare and a low, throaty grumble... until Toothless finally succumbs its control. He raises his head, his stare vacant and robotic, as his pupils turn to slits.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago then points to Hiccup. The Bewilderbeast responds, HISSING again at Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Witness true strength. The strength of will over others. In the face of it, you are nothing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless slowly turns to face Hiccup. Advancing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, what did he just tell you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bounding across the ice, pushing himself to make it to Hi in time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless, what's the matter with you? What're you doing?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup is backed against fallen ice, with Toothless advan mindlessly, and nowhere to run.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless opens his yawning mouth. Gas seeps from his thr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Knock it off! Stop! Snap out of it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick barrels through ice formations and over war machin racing against time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless! No! Toothless! Don't! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 79.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup sees Stoick about to run into the fray.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless BLASTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick leaps in front of it, shoving Hiccup out of the wa and absorbing the blast in the process. He's thrown again the ice with great impact.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON VALKA, hearing the blast, horrified.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago glances back, seeing Stoick laying lifeless in the aftermath, pleased by the sudden turn of events. He shuff off, satisfied.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stunned, Hiccup comes to and sees Stoick in the rubble. H rushes past the still-entranced Toothless, straining to scatter the ice boulders on top of Stoick's body.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dad!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka arrives, winded and aghast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stoick... She helps Hiccup to turn Stoick's body over. Valka presse her ear to Stoick's heart, confirming his death with a me glance to Hiccup. He tears up, overwhelmed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No... you...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber, Astrid, Eret, and the Gang arrive, slack-jawed.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Satisfied, the Bewilderbeast turns away, releasing Toothl of the trance-like state. Toothless blinks, coming to and confused. He approaches the group, sniffing Stoick's hand Hiccup SHOVES him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! Get away from him! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 80.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless recoils, innocently.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless retreats like a scolded dog, ear plates back an head hung low. Valka watches, broken-hearted, as Hiccup f upon Stoick, inconsolable.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's not his fault. You know that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: On the battlefield, the alpha BELLOWS, calling all of the dragons to gather. Meatlug, Stormfly, Hookfang and the ot all follow the command as the Gang calls after them.

dialogues.speaker: VALKA, (O.S.)
dialogues.text: Good dragons under the control of bad people do bad things.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago notices Toothless tumble down a snow-bank, once aga slit-eyed and entranced, but unable to fly to the alpha without a rider. Drago pins him down, eyeing the saddle, pedals, and prosthetic tail.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON HICCUP and VALKA

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In tears as Toothless rises into view, with Drago in the saddle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His soldiers cheer in the thousands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless! Hiccup tries to go after Toothless, but Valka holds him b

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, don't!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago JABS his bull hook and points toward the horizon. T alpha BELLOWS, commanding an exodus as it leads the way.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Move out!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup watches, powerless as all dragons TAKE WING and follow. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 81.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 2100 - Viking Funeral)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A KEEL grinds against the shoreline pebbles as a listing, battered ship is pushed into the still iceberg-filled lag

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: May the Valkyries welcome you, and lead you through Odin's great battlefield. May they sing your name with love and fury, so that we might hear it rise from the heights of Valhalla... and know that you've taken your rightful place at the table of kings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bows and pitch-dipped arrows are gathered from the battlefield. Gobber hands a set to Hiccup, meeting his ey with sympathetic glance.

dialogues.speaker: GOBBER, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: For a great man has fallen. A warrior. A chieftain. A father. A friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup dips his arrowhead in a smoldering chunk of wrecka igniting the pitch that coats the tip.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He releases his arrow, which sails through the air and la on the deck of the ship, where Stoick is laid out on a py covered by a sail, his axe upon his chest.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others follow Hiccup's lead. They DRAW BACK in unison LOOSE their arrows, filling the sky with crisscrossing, flaming streaks. They arc over the lagoon and set the shi alight. ON HICCUP, fighting back emotion and losing the battle.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm sorry, Dad.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He eyes the engulfed ship.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm not the chief that you wanted me to be. And I'm not peacekeeper I thought I was. I don't know...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka watches him, her heart breaking. She steps forward. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 82.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You came early into this world. You were such a wee thing. So frail, so fragile. I feared you wouldn't make it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup lowers his eyes, but Valka lifts his chin.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But your father... he never doubted. He always said you'd become the strongest of them all.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And he was right.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You have the heart of a chief and the soul of a dragon. Only you can bring our worlds together. That is who you are, son.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup meets her bolstering stare. He turns to the ship a watches it in silence, silhouetted in its glow.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I was so afraid of becoming my dad. Mostly because I thought I never could. How do you become someone that great? That brave? That selfless?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I guess you can only try. (to the others) A chief protects his own. We're going back.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh, with what?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He took all the dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not all of them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 2200 - Hatchlings to the Rescue)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: WHOOSH! WHOOSH! WHOOSH! JUVENILES BLUR past, like flying raptors, ZIGZAGGING wildly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Riding bareback, Hiccup & Co. HURTLE through the narr CHANNELS -- created by massive splits in the iceberg shel HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 83.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fly straight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I don't want to die!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can't fly these things!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, no kidding!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Fishlegs barrels into a snow bank, sending several chunks right into Eret's face as rides inverted and HOLLERING.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But won't that Bewilderbeast just take control of these guys, too?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They're babies. They don't listen to anyone!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah, just like us!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber follows up the rear clumsily, STRUGGLING for contr

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: This... is... very dangerous!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He PULLS ALONGSIDE Hiccup and Valka.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Some might suggest this is poorly conceived.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Well, it's a good thing that I never listen.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A SHARP RIDGE RUSHES up at them. They're going to CRASH. Hiccup ROUNDS one side of it, and Gobber flies down the o side. They shout through gaps in the iceberg.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: So what IS your plan?!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Get Toothless back and kick Drago's-

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's interrupted by another closure in the gaps of ice. T blast out of the other side. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 84.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Heads up!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They SPLIT to avoid another peak and then reconvene, only find another icy outcropping directly in their path.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And that thing.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gobber HITS it, with a THUD and a YELP.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 2450 - Hiccup Vs. Toothless)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Torches burn in their braziers as Berk slumbers... until Bewilderbeast approaches, STOMPING down on the monolithic Viking statues that guard the harbor.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The sound of destruction rouses a flock of Terrible Terro and Gothi, who was sleeping under the dragons. Their pupi turn to slits, and heeding the ultrasonic call, they fly

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gothi shuffles onto her deck, confused, then GASPS at horrifying sight.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A Gronckle lounges peacefully by the fire, as his Viking owner lavishes him with scratches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ah, that's a good boy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Gronckle's eyes suddenly turn to slits and it, too, t wing, knocking over a chair and table as it heads for the door.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Watch the furniture! Where are you going?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It barrels out of the hut and into the night sky as the Viking rushes to the doorway, spotting the same arresting sight with a gasp. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 85.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Vikings pour out of the Great Hall as all of Berk's drago fill the night sky and join the ranks of Drago's growing DRAGON ARMY.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast rises out of the sea, bearing down on t people of Berk as Drago hovers on Toothless, leading the charge. The Vikings stare, aghast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your chief is dead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Waves of shock and whispers of "Stoick?" spread through t crowd.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No one can protect you now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He thrusts his bull-hook, commanding the Bewilderbeast to fire. The Vikings watch in horror as the Bewilderbeast op its yawning jaws and BLASTS.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Dragon roars grow louder as Hiccup & Co. approach thr clouds, racing against time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They collectively GASP at the sight of Drago's Bewilderbe having now covered most of the village in explosions of i Berk's now commandeered dragons circle in a huddle behind him, joining Valka's flock, and corralled by Drago's armo dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He took all the dragons!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Distract the alpha. Try to keep his focus off of Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh... how?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Have you forgotten who you're riding with?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He brazenly aims his baby dragon toward the Bewilderbeast HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 86.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: There isn't a dragon alive that I can't wrangle!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His baby dragon dives toward the sea instead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Except for this one!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Amateur.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The others shrug and follow. As they get closer, the Bewilderbeast looms bigger and BIGGER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Berk's Vikings in hiding notice Hiccup and the others as approach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Look, it's Hiccup!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Vikings CHEER.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON DRAGO, surprised to see Hiccup and the others approach

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: What?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: With an irate HUFF, the Bewilderbeast focuses on Hiccup, gaining ever closer to Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Suddenly, a SHEEP appears in its sight, rising and fallin out of view. The Bewilderbeast blinks, confused.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It looks down to see Eret catching the falling sheep and reloading it into the game launcher, as Tuffnut cocks the mechanism and Ruffnut pulls the trigger.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Keep `em coming!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Snotlout tosses the black sheep to Tuffnut.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Black sheep, baby!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Exasperated, the alpha inhales, about to blast, when... H The game horn blares, breaking his concentration.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns, finding the horn unmanned. The Bewilderbeast th returns his focus to the sheep launcher, until the BLACK SHEEP LANDS on the his face, bouncing down his facial spi and becoming lodged. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 87.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ten points!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast shakes the black sheep off and prepares blast again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Uh-oh...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HONK! The alpha whips around -- still no one at the horn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON FISHLEGS, giggling and hiding behind the game horn.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast finally lets loose the ice blast, cover the entire horn in jagged spikes... as Fishlegs leaps fro the platform.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'm okay!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: as he reaches Drago, hovering directly in Toothless' sigh

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You certainly are hard to get rid of. I'll say that.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup ignored him and focuses on Toothless' slitted pupi

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless? It's me, bud. It's me. I'm right here. Come back to me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: TOOTHLESS' POV: Hiccup appears as an unfamiliar red blur, still firmly under the control of the Bewilderbeast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He is not yours anymore. He belongs to the alpha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago smugly sits back in the saddle, his arms open in invitation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But, please, oh great dragon master, try to take him. He will not miss a second time.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup holds strong, maintaining eye contact with Toothle He reaches out to touch him. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 88.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It wasn't your fault, bud. They made you do it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago's amusement fades as Toothless stirs. His pupils DILATE, then NARROW again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd never hurt him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You'd never hurt me.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago watches, amazed, as Toothless fights the control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: How are you doing that?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup holds the stare, tears in his eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Please. You are my best friend, bud.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Bewilderbeast ROARS a forceful command.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: My best friend.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless' pupils jitter, then DILATE fully. He coos sympathetically.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thatta boy! That's it! I'm here!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless' eyes finally dilate fully and resolve on Hiccu familiar face. Drago goes from astounded to alarmed. Drago STRIKES Tooth with the bull hook in a vain attempt to regain control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless ROARS defiantly, snatches the bull hook in his jaws, and PULLS... yanking Drago off of his back and send him both PLUMMETING to the sea.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But without a rider, Toothless drops out of the sky as we Hiccup leaps from the baby dragon, diving after him. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 89.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hang on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago breaks his fall, landing heavily upon the Bewilderbeast's tusk...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As Hiccup tucks in his arms, trying to close the gap betw he and Toothless before they both make impact with the oc

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Almost there, buddy. Almost there!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup reaches Toothless. They pair up, mid-air, and skyrocket past Drago as he hobbles to the top of the alph head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 2500 - One True Alpha)

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup looks back at Drago, now issuing commands from the of the Bewilderbeast's head.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Do something!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We need to get those two apart.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup flies Toothless past a flag pole tears a strip of flag.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast BLASTS in their direction, barely missi them as they disappear around the back of a mountain.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We gotta block him out, Toothless. Do you trust me, bud?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless coos, allowing Hiccup to BLINDFOLD him with the flag. Hiccup calms him with a touch.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: We can do this. You and me. As one.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup SPLAYS Toothless' mechanical tail. Toothless respo MATCHING the move with the natural half.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That's it. Now let's try this one more time! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 90.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They PEEL around the other side of the mountain, heading back toward Drago and Bewilderbeast, passing Astrid and t cheering Vikings on the ground.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take them down, babe!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Viking roar in support as Hiccup and Toothless race p

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka watches with pride as her son hurtles towards Drago the alpha.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Go get `em.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Take control of it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast's HISS becomes a furious ROAR, but to n avail. Hiccup clamps his hands over Toothless' ear plates muffling the alpha's commands.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Shut it out, Toothless!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast BLASTS!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless suddenly PULLS UP, ARCING over Drago's head! Dr LAUGHS, victorious, then pauses in shock.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: DRAGO'S POV: as Toothless climbs inverted through the sky the blindfold falls free, revealing an EMPTY SADDLE.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago WHIRLS around, wide-eyed, to see...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: HICCUP ZOOMING TOWARD HIM, his wing-suit deployed, and hi Dragon Blade trailing Zippleback gas. Drago SWIPES but mi him. Hiccup clicks the lighter and ignites the gas, blast Drago off his Bewilderbeast with a SCREAM.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago PLUMMETS, BREAKING HIS FALL against the massive dragon's spines and landing hard on the ground, his bullh landing just out of reach.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast WHIPS its tail, trying to SWAT down Hic HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 91.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not again.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless pops open his dorsal blades, arcs skyward, and rejoins Hiccup just before colliding with the alpha's tai

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come on, bud!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Together again, they speed along the length of the thrash tail...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And shoot past the tip of the tail, narrowly making it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Yeah! We did it!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They arc through the sky and LAND a few paces from Drago, kicking up a trail of dust.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Battered and weary, Drago reaches for his bullhook. Hiccu extends and fires up his Dragon Blade, hurling it like a javelin, and sticking it in the ground between Drago and weapon, singeing his outstretched hand.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Agghh!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hold him there Toothless!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless SNARLS a warning, ready to blast.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It's all over now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: But the cloud of dust settles, revealing the Bewilderbeas rising behind Hiccup, ready to blast him instead.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Or is it?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup spins around, alarmed, as a RUSH of water THUNDERS the Bewilderbeast's throat.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, no! HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 92.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: It BLASTS, but Toothless leaps into the way, shielding Hi beneath him. The freezing explosion envelops them both.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago laughs to himself as Valka lands her baby dragon an rushes to the icy explosion, hammering away at it desperately.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No! No...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ON ASTRID and GOBBER, watching from a distance, horrified Valka POUNDS at the ice, a GLOWS forms from deep within. realizes what is about to happen and backs away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A BLAST thunders from inside the ice, SHATTERING it. Toothless emerges from the debris, revealing Hiccup curle safely under his wings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless is steaming, his black skin glowing blue with r his split dorsal blades searing with blue heat, a glow emanating from his flared nostrils.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He turns back to Hiccup, to check if he's unharmed, then turns his full attention back to the Bewilderbeast. He le out of the crater and lands upon an ice spire, roaring ferociously.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast bellows back at this affront. Toothless unleashes a salvo of plasma into the Bewilderbeast's face not letting up.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He's challenging the alpha!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: To protect you. The Bewilderbeast ROARS at this act of insubordination. Toothless fires back, time and again, fully in control.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The alpha thrashes his tusks through the ice, trying to s Toothless, but he deftly spring from spire to spire, continuing his unrelenting attack.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: In the midst of the mayhem, the horde of commandeered dra -- both Berk's and Valka's -- break free from the control witness Toothless' retaliation.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless lands protectively by Hiccup and Valka, command the dragons to shift sides. The follow, amassing behind Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Seeing this, Drago panics and rushes toward the Bewilderbeast. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 93.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: No, no, no, no! Fight back! Fight!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago clambers up the Bewilderbeast's tusk, totally unhin

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (to the defecting dragons) What's the matter with you?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Berkians swell in to show their unified support. Drag fumes as Hiccup and Toothless fly up together onto an ice spire.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Now do you get it? This is what it is to earn a dragon's loyalty.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Let this end now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Never! Come on!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He hammers the Bewilderbeast, spurring it into a charge.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
