dialogues.text: Toothless calls over his shoulder, commanding the dragons ready themselves. He then BLASTS the Bewilderbeast, mid- charge. Suddenly, Skullcrusher fires. Followed by another and another.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup looks around, amazed to see the flock of dragons opening fire on Drago and his Bewilderbeast. They've star a rebellion.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Drago is forced to hide from the fiery barrage by taking cover in the tall spines of the giant's crown.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: His prosthetic arm is blasted clean off by one of his own armored dragons.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Bewilderbeast rears back to cover them all in ice, bu Toothless lets loose a powerful shot. The Bewilderbeast's head is KNOCKED backward by a blue-flame fireball.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the smoke clears, one of its massive TUSKS FALLS to th ground, sheared clean off. Drago glares at Toothless.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless ROARS commandingly, calling an end to the fight

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The alpha protects them all. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 94.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Overwhelmed and overpowered, the Bewilderbeast yields to new alpha and heeds Toothless' command, retreating into t sea in an explosive splash.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Berkians CHEER in victory!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: As the smoke clears, Hiccup and Toothless see nothing but bubbles on the waves to mark their disappearance. No sign the Bewilderbeast... or Drago.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless hops down from the spire, cooling off, as peopl celebrate all around them.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: All of the dragons -- Berk's, Valka's, even Drago's -- la around Toothless. Cloudjumper bows to Toothless, starting wave of bows, acknowledging their new alpha.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless looks around, surprised, then lets out a majest ROAR. The assembled dragons join in, roaring in tribute.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless turns to Hiccup as he approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: You never cease to amaze me, bud. Thank you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless GURGLES and licks Hiccup's face. Hiccups squeal trying to get away.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless! You know that doesn't wash out.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The crowd laughs. All around them, Berk's dragons reunite with their Vikings.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormfly!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Stormfly bounds into Astrid.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh, give me a cuddle, Grumpy!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Grump lands ON TOP of Gobber, flattening him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Relieved to the point of tears, Snotlout and Fishlegs rac towards the expectant Ruffnut...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Who's my little princess?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: ... and then right PAST her to embrace their dragons. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 95.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I missed you so much!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Don't you ever leave again, Hookfang!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut GRUMBLES, dejected. Barf dips his head in to cons her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Oh Barf!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She hugs him. Belch looms in for some affection, but Ruff pushes him away...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Not you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And into Tuffnut who glowers back at her.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup smiles, taking in the happy reunions. Skullcrusher approaches him, without an owner to reunite with. Hiccup him, as Eret approaches.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: That was some pretty fine dragon wrangling back there. You'd make a good trapper.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Before Hiccup can respond, Skullcrusher nuzzles Eret affectionately. Eret chuckles and gently strokes him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Y'know, Skullcrusher's gonna need somebody to look after him now.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Me?

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup nods reassuringly. Eret looks at Skullcrusher, pau to consider it.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: I'd be honored.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Valka walks up to her son, bursting with pride.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Your father... he'd be every bit as proud as I am. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 96.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Thank you. I'm really glad you're here, Mom.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: And here I'll stay.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless arrives, purring at Valka's touch as Astrid str toward Hiccup, beaming proudly.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: See? I told you it was in here.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: She places her hand upon his chest, then quickly pokes th dorsal fin button, popping it open. She GIGGLES.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ha, ha. Still doing that one? That's hilarious.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Come here, you.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He scoops Astrid close and pulls her into a kiss. Gobber covers a gawking boy's eyes.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ooh.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Gothi, the elder, taps Hiccup's shoulder, interrupting th romantic moment. She gestures for Hiccup to kneel. He doe so, respectfully.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Using ash from a heap of burnt wreckage, Gothi traces a Viking symbol onto Hiccup's forehead. She bows.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup stands, meeting Gobber's proud, smiling eyes. Gobb turns to the silent crowd and throws up his arms.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The chief has come home!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: The Berkians erupt with cheers and applause as Hiccup tak in the moment, acknowledging the weight of responsibility upon him.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless throws back his head and BLASTS in celebration, spurring all other dragons to follow suit, lighting up th sky in a spectacular display.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: (Scene 2700 - A New Beginning) HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 97.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: A sheep grazes lazily on the grass as a Terrible Terror struggles in vain to carry him off. Suddenly, both are snatched up by a passing dragon.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Ruffnut and Tuffnut wrestle over the sheep atop Barf &amp Ruffnut send the sheep flying toward Fishlegs. Snotlout n it instead, blowing a kiss mockingly.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: This... is Berk. A bit trampled and busted and covered in ice, but it's home. It's our home.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They swoop past a gathered crowd on the battered bleacher Snotlout dunks the sheep in his basket. Eret joins the ra atop Skullcrusher.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: They fly past Hiccup and Toothless, who are steadily hois a palette of timber and supplies onto a rooftop where wor are rebuilding the damaged houses.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup then turns his attention to a massive statue of Stoick, presently under construction. He grins with pride

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: Those who attacked us are relentless and crazy. But those who stopped them? Oh, even more so!

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: He looks to the horizon, scanning it from east to west to ensure that no trouble is approaching.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid and Stormfly buzz past him playfully, coaxing him join the game. He smiles.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We may be small in numbers, but we stand for something bigger than anything the world can pit against us.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid soars past the blacksmith stall, waving to Valka a Gobber as they remove the armor from Drago's freed battle dragons.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: We are the voice of peace. And bit by bit, we will change this world. HTTYD 2 (D. DeBlois) - FINAL DRAFT - 05/05/14 98.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Realizing that he's late, Gobber hurries over to the shee launcher and pulls the trigger, sending the black sheep hurtling into the air.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Astrid and Stormfly close in on the black sheep, about to snatch it out of the air, when suddenly, Hiccup and Tooth dart past, beating them to it. Toothless looks back with gummy smile.

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: You see, we have something they don't. Oh sure, they have armies and they have armadas...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless and Hiccup dive toward the line of baskets. As approach, Toothless bounces Hiccup into the air, allowing to dunk the black sheep into Astrid's basket. They reunit the other side. The crowd cheers!

dialogues.speaker: HICCUP, (V.O.)
dialogues.text: But we... we have...

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Hiccup and Toothless land upon the chief's dais, joined b Astrid, Stormfly, and the other dragon riders.

dialogues.speaker: Unknown
dialogues.text: Toothless lets out a proud roar as Hiccup look out over B gleaming with pride.
